ðŸ›  Download LCZ4r-QGIS plugin

Download both the General and Local Functions R scripts for QGIS integration - Download as zip file

The zip file includes all necessary scripts to integrate LCZ4r into your QGIS environment. For detailed installation instructions, visit our installation guide.
